website_summaries.verdict: Redefine your desktop experience with this cloud-based reliable alternative to the big box.
pros: This Chromebook is straightforward to setup and use, making it a good option for a first Chromebook for those new to the Chrome OS
It's compatible with Google Play apps and works well for streaming
Intel Celeron 3205U processor and 4GB DDR3L ram make for a fast little machine
For connectivity, the HDMI port and four USB 3.0 ports will satisfy most users
cons: Upgrading this computer may be more difficult than competing models

customer_reviews.title: Better than Windows for about 90% of users.
customer_reviews.text: Chromeboxes are AMAZING computers. As a computer consultant, I deal with many different operating systems that my clients have. I work with Windows, Mac, Ubuntu, iOS, Android and Chrome OS. And for about 90% of my clients, the Chromebox or Chromebook is BY FAR the best choice. They run very fast (4 seconds to start up and 4 seconds to shut down), they are very sturdy against viruses and malware and super simple to operate! That's the perfect combination for beginner and advanced users alike.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S. In Tempe, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Compact
customer_reviews.text: I was deciding for a while on which chromebox I should get and ultimately went with this one! It’s bundling with a keyboard and mouse is really hard to pass up. Not to mention the keyboard is actually really great! As for the computer itself, love the compact tower style. Great for small spaces and desks. It booted up really fast and is very responsive and zippy. I was nervous about the 2GB of ram situation, but ChromeOS seems to be very light and capable. Definitely happy with my purchase. Would recommend to anyone needing a fast straightforward desktop PC.
customer_reviews.author: Leo L.

customer_reviews.title: Would DEFINITELY recommend
customer_reviews.text: After a great experience with my first Chromebook, I went ahead and recommended this Chromebox to my parents who typically struggle with any kind of tech. After being introduced to Chrome OS that couldn't be any happier. They have been amazed that they were able to get a computer to fit their everyday needs so perfectly at such a reasonable price (and for it run incredibly smoothly!). Chrome OS is a game changer for anyone that finds most other operating systems daunting, And this is a great desktop to introduce anyone to the Chrome family.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Valadez

customer_reviews.title: Acer Chromebox, great for quick simple, but very limited use.
customer_reviews.text: The Fan is NOT loud. Keyboard and mouse are fine. Perfect for folks who just want to browse the internet. No Good games available no Chrome (AIRMECH does not work on this device) But be aware once you open and use you CANNOT return it. Great for older folks who don't want to worry about installing programs, getting viruses. I have since purchased a new computer running windows, I regret getting this and not an actual ChromeBOOK which in the end is more useful to suit my needs. But you are fully aware of what you are getting when you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Berj

customer_reviews.title: Faster than our Win 10 laptops.
customer_reviews.text: The CX12 is the perfect alternative for a low-cost surfing computer. The Chrombox actually performs faster than our WIN 10 laptops. The Chromebox is listed as one that will receive Play Store access in Q1 17. I placed a Samsung curved 22" HD monitor on a piece of lauan plywood secured with zip ties, with the CX12 located on a shelf next to my chair. We are now able to place the setup on our laps for a cheaper and lighter alternative to a 17" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chromebox for simple daily browsing.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ChromeBox. It boots up really fast. I was debating on getting the 2GB or 4GB one but ended up with the 2GB model. I am happy with it. Its fast. I haven't noticed any lag or issues thus far. Great product for browsing the web. I have Chromebook Plus and Android Phone so this compliments my desktop needs.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device!
customer_reviews.text: It's been working really well for my fiance! He doesn't need a whole lot, but to simply work in Google Drive for D&D stuff. He loves it and it looks pretty good on the big screen TV! It's small, so it's far from getting in the way and is a fantastic addition like a Chromecast (just bigger and more independent). The downside however is the corded Keyboard and mouse. That's getting replaced here soon. It's not that they're bad quality (they're pretty decent), but set up with a TV in the bedroom makes it very inconvenient to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Great computer for the whole family. We put this Chromebox on the desk in our kitchen and it works great. Especially useful considering the kids use Cromebooks and Google Docs at school. It's seamless. My only complaint is the mouse acceleration. I don't like that at all and there doesn't seem to be a way to disable that. I particularly hate the acceleration when it comes to the scroll wheel.
customer_reviews.author: RadioChuck

customer_reviews.title: A great product. I attached it to a 24 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product. I attached it to a 24 inch TV, logged in to Google and was instantly online. Boots up in less than 10 seconds. Plenty of USB ports (4) and an SD card reader. I use Uverse for my home wifi (6MB per second) and noticed no delays or buffering. For web browsing and using the cloud for storage I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Joerger

customer_reviews.title: Super fast web browsing and HD playback without any buffering
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews. I'm very impressed by this little thing. Super fast web browsing and HD playback without any buffering. So much better than explorer. I use side by side with by old lagging pc that functions but takes very long to load websites and play youtube videos but I didnt feel like spending $500 for a new computer. This thing is a rocket for everyday browsing, paying bills, youtube and gmail. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Goosebumpzao

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest product ever! I love Chrome OS and this desktop version of a Chromebook was a perfect gift for my dad. He had no trouble adapting and is never going back to Windows again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Heilman

customer_reviews.title: but excellent for internet browsing
customer_reviews.text: Cannot run 3rd party apps or software, but excellent for internet browsing. A cheap addition to a family living room, office, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product overall
customer_reviews.text: Nice product overall. can get a little slow sometimes when doing resource intensive task e.g. watching high quality youtube video or uploading images to google photo but overall quite decent for what I needed. Watching netflix on this was painful on my 4k TV, had to reduce the resolution to around 720 but I think that is more of a ChromeOS issue then the box itself. Overall most recommended for anyone who want a cheap way to get ChromeOS. I have currently got this hooked to a 4K Tv and using a logitech K400 wireless keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebox. Just be sure you have a printer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Chromebox. Just be sure you have a printer capable of Google Cloud Print as Chrome OS does not support drivers for printers.
customer_reviews.author: James Ball

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but 2 gb is limiting
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but 2 gb is limiting. I upgraded the memory to 4 gb and now my wife, who is a Google power user, loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Use it for streaming live TV
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Use it for streaming live TV. No jumps out delays. The best part is there is no wait when turning it on. Wish I didn't have to log in everytime makes it a little bit of a pain when using a wireless remote keyboard. All in all great lite computer.
customer_reviews.author: Galaxy

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this computer
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this computer. I mostly surf, pay bills, shop. Windows 10 was more program than I needed it seemed to slow down more everyday. Using Chromebox it is so fast. Keyboard and mouse are nothing special, they work fine. Even my old HP printer/scanner/copier was plug and go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chromebox. Dissapointed the mouse and keyboard are not ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice chromebox. Dissapointed the mouse and keyboard are not wireless however I used the wireless dongle from my HP chromebox and it worked so orderd wireless keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Mpg

customer_reviews.title: Such and fantastic alternitive to a clunky desktop.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, compact and no windows. Run by Google. Love the compact desktop. Blue toothed my key board and mouse. Working very well with my large screen monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ortagus

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my mom, who really only uses ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom, who really only uses email, facebook, and does online contests. This worked perfectly. I had it shipped to me and set it up at my place before I sent it to her. She was able to set it up all herself and everything worked without problem.
customer_reviews.author: SteoanK

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive solution that's hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Chromebox. It doesn't do everything a PC can do, but as a Web device it's pretty much all you really need. The Acer is a great little machine, that weighs nothing and takes up no room. The keyboard and mouse are fine and it's nice that they're included. Overall, this is an inexpensive solution that's good for Web browsing and light computing and office tasks. For the money, it's really hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Township Free Public Library

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for HS student
customer_reviews.text: Very fast. Exactly as described. Kids use google docs for all of school work, so no need for MS Office. Perfect for HS student, if you happen to have old monitor and keyborad around from PC that has become to slow.
customer_reviews.author: Princeton Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great piece. I use this as the Chromebook in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great piece. I use this as the Chromebook in my office for testing purposes of our student devices. Have it hooked to a flat panel TV. It's been a great piece with no obvious lags in my work.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Floyd

customer_reviews.title: best computer i own
customer_reviews.text: best computer i own. fast, instant boot up, no viruses. constantly updated. I have a windows desktop that I have running and remote login to if i need any windows apps run.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT N.

customer_reviews.title: The Acer chrombox is good, it takes some getting use to compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: The Acer chrombox is good, it takes some getting use to compared to MS product but it is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: ray hurst

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful replacement for a windows desktop
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the cost. Replaced my windows desk top with the chromebox. Very pleased no more windows updates to screw with and more secure.
customer_reviews.author: GandalfG

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and I am no longer getting bombarded with pop-up ads like I did with Windows 10. I use this mostly on the internet and it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Demel

customer_reviews.title: The computer worked great when it did
customer_reviews.text: The computer worked great when it did...however, it refused to boot up right after the 1-year warranty expired. The error message said there was an issue with the SSD. Very disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good unit, but proprietary features made it difficult to add apps.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little box
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little box. Works as expected however, the fan is a bit too loud to the point of being distracting if the machine is on the desk in a quiet office.
customer_reviews.author: Odessit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent......try it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: Boots up in only 8 seconds. More secure than Windows desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Determined One

customer_reviews.title: If you like chrome OS and want to use it on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable, quick boot time. Will work with two external monitors if hooked up as one to displayport and one to hdmi. If you like chrome OS and want to use it on a desktop configuration, this device gets it done. Quiet, can be used with bluetooth keyboard and mouse. No regrets about purchase. Just be sure that Chrome OS suits your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Used in business; employees cannot introduce damaging virus or install unauthorized programs.
customer_reviews.author: lar

customer_reviews.title: I bought this Chromebox for my trial of replacing windows ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chromebox for my trial of replacing windows desktop at school. Up to now it fullfil my expectations, it starts up quickly, chrome apps run smoothly, and it is so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Easy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to set up Use it as a VPN browser on the TV Fast responses
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Web Browsing and Gmail made wicked easy !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just excellent ! Set's up in minutes, and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chmura III

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for my farher
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for my dad who only needed internet and email computer. Didn't need operating system or office so cost was less than $200. Speed is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Donnie J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to me and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ken korth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it runs fast small compact just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Texasgurl

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Chromebox. Does what it is supposed to do. 4G memory. Keyboard and mouse are low end, but work fine. If you need to use an adapter for the HDMI port, I recommend using one that is a flexible cable rather than a HDMI/VGA connector. I used a connector, but it extends out the back. It is somewhat precarious and can easily be knocked loose.
customer_reviews.author: Ncicj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice system. I use my television as the monitor. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: marytee

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than I paid.
customer_reviews.text: Had been considering purchasing a new full fledged desktop for my bookkeepers work station. After a brief education about the Chromebox I realized that I did not need to spend the money on a desktop. All of our bookkeeping is done online with quickbooks so Acer Chromebox was the perfect choice. It has also initiated the use of Google DOCs......Good bye MS Office. This little box is a home run and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Delavan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great for Internet and general online streaming media
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great for Internet and general online streaming media. Because it is Google OS you can't install programs and the word processing is sometimes glitchy when bouncing from this computer to a windows machine with WORD.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chromebox. Boot up fast and the box is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chromebox. Boot up fast and the box is so small that it just mounted to the back of the 23" monitor. It will be great if the keyboard and mouse are USB wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ong

customer_reviews.title: there is nothing like desktop etc where u can put ur files/folders/music for ...
customer_reviews.text: chrome locks u to its eco system, everything u have to put on g drive, there is nothing like desktop etc where u can put ur files/folders/music for fast access; good speed to browse news etc; its restrictive platform......if u just want to browse and check ur mails this is fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Saritha Aleti

customer_reviews.title: does well for replacing my dad's old win7 system. ...
customer_reviews.text: does well for replacing my dad's old win7 system. remote desktop program is not as flexible as I had hoped, with his cursor not showing up on my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B. Van Wormer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, exceed expectations, fast delivery, fast boot, fast internet connection, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Damieon Love

customer_reviews.title: This is so FAST and Smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I switched over from a windows laptop. This is so FAST and Smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to access internet on my TV
customer_reviews.text: I am using the chromebox as a media player accessing tv channels on the Internet. It worked out of the box. Easy to use and set up. Small size is perfect under the TV. Very efficient for a small price.
customer_reviews.author: JNG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and fast
customer_reviews.text: This is all you need to browse the Internet and watch videos.
customer_reviews.author: NRB20

customer_reviews.title: com/chromeos/recovery" where no useful information for recovering my device can be found at ...
customer_reviews.text: After only 4 months, my Acer Chromebox has completely stopped working. Upon inserting recovery media, a prompt says "An unexpected error has occurred. Please refer to this URL for troubleshooting tips:[...]" where no useful information for recovering my device can be found at all. This is unacceptable. I would be fine with a shelf life of 2 years, maybe even 1, but 4 months? I'm completely disappointed and will not be ordering any Acer products ever again, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: using it now. so far so good. too early to say i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was ok. Suddenly, No good
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working suddenly. Nothing new installed or cranberries that. Recovery tool looks good but the recovery ends in an unexpected error. I used to prefer Asus but not this incident gave me different opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Ag

customer_reviews.title: I should have informed me better on printing
customer_reviews.text: What I expected. I should have informed me better on printing, but I suppose I will learn how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly lousy product. It constantly hangs on web sites and has to be restarted. There does not seem to be any cure for the recurrent and annoying problem. Mostly you get to recover your work, but this should not happen. I really made a big mistake buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bryen

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, very specific niche
customer_reviews.text: Chrome OS is very limited as to what it can do. This computer is a glorified Google Chrome device. You can dual boot it with some fidgeting, but it's not worth it. If you need a device to just browse the internet and use google docs, I'm sure this would be great, but for what I needed it to do, it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chrome makes it dificult to download stuff on it....its harasdibg
customer_reviews.author: Dushi heyer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy setup and use as expected from a Chromebox
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup and use as expected from a Chromebox. Would be nice to have the mouse third button programmable but otherwise value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Acer Chromebox CXI2-4GKM Desktop with Keyboard and Mouse
product_meta.description:
Size:4GBAcer Chromebox CXI2-4GKM Desktop PC comes with these specs: Intel Celeron Processor 3205U, Google Chrome, 4GB DDR3L Memory, Intel HD Graphics, 16GB SSD, Digital Media Card Reader -Secure Digital (SD) Card, High Definition Audio Support, 4 - USB 3.0 Ports, HDMI, Gigabit Ethernet, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0, Keyboard and Mouse, 1.21 lbs. | 550 g (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support, Registration/ Limited Warranty Card (DT.Z09AA.004)

AMAZON.COM
